_gram:
(but only <ab>P.</ab> when
preceded by {#aDi, prati#} and {#ati#})
_meanings:
{@--2@} To
place, put on or upon, throw into,
{#srajamapi SirasyaMDaH kziptAM DunotyahiSaMkayA#}
<ls>Ś. 7. 24</ls>; <ls>Y. 1. 230</ls>; <ls>Bg. 16. 19.</ls>

{@--3@} To fix on, attach to (as a blame);
{#Bftye dozAn kzipati#} <ls>H. 2.</ls>

{@--4@} To cast
or throw off, cast away, rid oneself
of; {#kiM kUrmasya BaravyaTA na vapuzi kzmAM na#}
{#kzipatyeza yat#} <ls>Mu. 2. 18.</ls>

{@--5@} ({%a%}) To take
away, destroy; <ls>Māl. 1. 17.</ls> ({%b%}) To kill
or slay; {#kesarI nizWurakziptamfgayUTo#} 
{#mfgADipaH#} <ls>Śi. 2. 53.</ls>

{@--7@} To insult, revile, abuse, scold;
<ls>Ms. 8. 312</ls>, <ls n="Ms. 8.">270</ls>; <ls>Śānti. 3. 10.</ls>
